nodes.title: Added ability to project id and version properties, fixes #170
Fix Issue #151: Error converting from Date to Instant
Allow pagination default size smaller that the maximum size #134
allow setting null values during update
add ability to use Sum projection with properties of types derived from Number
add support for LocalDateTime as @DateCreated and @DateUpdated target
Fixes bootJar task for now and upgrades Spring Data JDBC benchmark to Boot 2.2 M5.
Added Spring Data JDBC to the benchmarks
Log queries consistently, even when it's a custom JDBC construct
[Issue #24] Added jackson annotations to make Page deserializable
'Cannot write a read-only property' exception in example-jdbc-kotlin
Upgraded shadow plugin to 5.1.0 to support Gradle 5.x
Fix double-escape in DROP TABLE sql. Fixes #383
Document how to create a native-image for MariaDB
Fix NullPointerException for Embedded null values
Fix Issue #254 UnsupportedOperationException when use java.sql.Date
- Use "And" to split multiple conditions in OrderBy method
Update documentation for partial data updates
Fixing BigDecimal always mapped to Long
Updating documentation for using hibernate jpa
add JDK 13.0.x to GitHub workflow matrix
Add note for jdbc native queries with joins
Issue #547 Sort on multiple columns fails
Repository.update JSON column serialization using jsonCodec
Allow the use of ID types other than long (#420).
Only apply declared join specs to write operations. Fixes #398
Add support for a transactional datasource. Fixes #267
Adding release automation configuration and bots
Note that deleteAll does not cascade.
